snippet: The payment represents the Swiss National Bank’s share of the remaining equity value of the fund created to hold distressed assets as part of UBS’s rescue plan five years ago.
abstract: The payment represents the Swiss National Bank’s share of the remaining equity value of the fund created to hold distressed assets as part of UBS’s rescue plan five years ago.

headline.main: UBS Pays $3.76 Billion to Swiss Central Bank in Buyback of Toxic Assets
